content.prompt: Which of the following best describes why this code segment will not work as intended?

choices.label: substring  needs to be called with two parameters, so the method call in line 3 should be changed to  word.substring(len, len + 1).
len  is not the correct index of the last character in  word,  so the method call in line 3 should be changed to  word.substring(len - 1).
len  is not the correct index of the last character in  word,  so the method call in line 3 should be changed to  word.substring(len + 1).
substring  cannot be called with a variable as the parameter, so the method call in line 3 should be changed to  word.substring(word.length()).

skill.text: 3.D: Explain why a code segment will not compile or work as intended and modify the code to correct the error.
